title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Analyzing the Effectiveness of Direct Instruction: Intermediate Social Studies Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: The core principles of direct instruction (explicit teaching, systematic presentation of examples, etc.) can be applied and explained in social studies curriculum design.
Three or more social science educational scenarios based on direct instruction can be developed via mobile learning modules within two weeks.
Formative assessment, combined with peer feedback and instructor evaluation, can improve educational design competencies by over 20%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
